snippet.title: Democracy 2 Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for the PC Indie Strategy Game Democracy 2 (also on mac) From Positech Games at http://www.democracygame.com. The most complex and detailed 'sim-country' game ever made, this game puts you in the position of president or prime minister, with the goal of staying in office long enough to transform your virtual country into the country of your dreams (or nightmares).
A critically claimed game that is used in a number fo schools, colleges, universities and some business organizations to teach decision making skills, Democracy 2 is also a great way to flex your political will and give life to your theories and views on politics.
Easy to mod, easy to learn, extremely hard to master.
